articles.title: Tanya Roberts, After Premature Death Announcement, Has Died at 65 - Extra
articles.description: After a shocking retraction of the announcement that Bond girl and "That '70s Show" star Tanya Roberts had died Sunday, "Extra" has confirmed that Roberts died late Monday. She was 65.
